data.market_trends: Current trends suggest an increasing interest in sustainable travel practices. Travelers are looking for eco-friendly accommodations and experiences.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers are more inclined toward short getaways and spontaneous trips during spring, capitalizing on favorable weather conditions.
data.competitive_landscape: Denmark is positioned as a premium destination with a focus on quality experiences, competing with neighboring Nordic countries.
data.seasonal_factors: Spring enhances the natural appeal of Denmark, making it favorable for outdoor events, garden tours, and city explorations.
